articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD rallies above $2000 as the Fed hints rate cuts - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price advanced sharply late in the New York session after the Federal Reserve decided to keep rates unchanged, opening the door for monetary policy easing next year.
articles.content:
• Gold’s rallied more than 1.30% as traders brace for Powell’s press conference.
  • Federal Reserve officials voted unanimously and expect at least three rate cuts for 2024.
